# UnsafeRawBufferPointer.Indices

**Type Alias**

A type that represents the indices that are valid for subscripting the collection, in ascending order.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Indices = Range<Int>
```
title: UnsafeRawBufferPointer.Indices
